ResearchProjectDef.label: Geneseed Extraction (Space Marine)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the surgery to be able to extract geneseeds from progenoid glands of space marines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Geneseed Extraction (Primaris Marine)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the surgery to be able to extract geneseeds from progenoid glands of primaris marines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stasis Resurrection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the surgery to be able to revive Space Marines from their stasis ability.
